pageTitle: The Open Group Certified Architect (Open CA) Program - Certification Board Schedule
textBeforeTable: Certification Board Schedule These are the future scheduled meetings of Certification Boards, the date and location and the organization which is running the board. textAfterTable: Kindly submit packages two weeks in advance of the cutoff date to allow for review and revision, if necessary. Note In order to be scheduled for a Certification Review Board, candidates must have submitted their materials and had them accepted by the Certification Authority at least 45 days in advance of the meeting. Acceptance by the Certification Authority takes the form of explicit messages to denote acceptance of the Certification Package and the Method Document (if applicable). The 45 day cutoff dates are shown in the table above. To achieve acceptance by this date, initial submission of Certification Packages should be made at least two weeks in advance of the cutoff date.
